description: A capacitor for the Nanogun's boosted electrothermal-chemical action, which improves armor penetration at the cost of more power consumption, noise and recoil.
A capacitor for the overcharged MS400 electrothermal-chemical action, which improves damage, effective range and armor penetration at the cost of more power consumption, noise and recoil.

A capacitor for overcharged 5.56 ETC caliber electrothermal-chemical guns, improving penetration against the heaviest drone and power armors at the cost of much more power consumption, noise and recoil.
